means: be的过去时复数和第二人称单数形式
有时代替 was,用于条件从句、动词 wish 之后等
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 沃尔 Ware的变体

sentence.Network_en: His hands were too weak to cock his revolver.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的手没劲儿，扳不动左轮手枪的扳机。

sentence.Network_en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentence.Network_cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentence.Network_en: The rescuers were beaten back by strong winds and currents.
sentence.Network_cn: 救援人员因风浪太大而被迫中断工作。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语国际音标【附发音器官示意图】_百度文库 ... nurse 护士 were 是(过去时) her 她的.
The police were baffled , and Sherlock Holm was called in to investigate ., 警方被难住了 , 于是请福尔摩斯前来侦查.
The principal conquests of the Romans were achieved under the republic ;, 罗马主要的征服都是在共和体制之下完成;
Now we were driving to Sevilla , I took some pictures in the car ., 现在我们正驾车前往塞尔维亚 , 在车上我拍了一些像片.

list.abs: you wouldn ' t say so , if you were me ., 如果你是我 , 你就不会这么认为了.
it is a college that was established in the United States at a time when African Americans were not allowed to attend college with white students .泛指那些美国境内的学院，当它们建校时，非裔美国人尚不能进入有白人学生就读的学校。
they were young and they had each other ., 他们都还年轻 , 他们彼此互相拥有.
while they were talking , a man came up ., 当他们正在谈话时 , 一个男的走了过来.
z if i were you , i won ' t tell him about this ., 如果我是你 , 我不跟他说.

entry.tran: （be的过去时复数和第二人称单数形式）
entry.def: Were is the plural and the second person singular of the past tense of be.

entry.tran: （有时代替 was，用于条件从句、动词 wish 之后等）
entry.def: Were is sometimes used instead of 'was' in certain structures, for example in conditional clauses or after the verb 'wish'.

example.ex: He told a diplomat that he might withdraw if he were allowed to keep part of a disputed oil field...
example.tran: 他告诉一名外交官，如果允许他保留一个有争议油田的一部分，他可能就会撤兵。

example.ex: He believes in atheism as though it were a new religion.
example.tran: 他信奉无神论就像信仰一种新的宗教。

auth_sentence.content: Then we were told to put on our respirators.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then we were told to put on our respirators.

auth_sentence.content: Fields were overgrown, pavements taken over by weeds.

auth_sentence.content: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.
